Play Chessboard Game FEN/PGN viewer with evaluation without leaving chrome; with your friends or alone in one click, onley in chrome browser using "Chessboard" extension.

How it works:

after installing "Chessboard" extension in chrome web store, All what you need to do is just click on the "Chessboard" icon, it will open.

Chessboard is an easy and simple game to play chess and enjoy your time.
